1.content: Cognitech makes many products. Which are you interested in?
1.title: Introductions

1111.content:
You wake up on a bed in a dimly-lit room. The last thing you remember was being in a nightclub. A beautiful woman had offered to buy you a drink and naturally you accepted.

"Hello?" you ask. "Where am I"

You get no response.

Feeling air moving against your skin you realise that your clothes have been taken. You can tell that you are completely naked except for your underwear. In fact you become very aware of your underwear as it feels a lot thicker than usual. You reach down and feel smooth plastic covering your groin. Sitting up on the bed, you look down and discover that you're wearing a large disposable diaper.

"What the hell is going on?" you ask.

You reach for the tapes of the diaper and try to tear them open.

Suddenly you feel an electric shock in your neck. The pain makes you stop instantly. The shock stops as you remove your hands from the diaper. Moving your hands up to the site of the pain you find that you are also wearing some sort of collar. It feels soft but as you pull at it to try to take it off you receive another shock.

A door opens, letting bright light into the room. "Welcome Daniel." The woman from the nightclub steps into the room. "I see you've already discovered what happens when you try to take off your diaper or collar."

"You." you say, recognising her. "You drugged me."

"Yes." she says. "And brought you to this facility."

"Where am I?" you ask.

"This is the Cognitech AI Lab." she says. "Where we produce the AI chips."

"Cognitech?" you ask. "What do they want with me?"

"Cognitech hasn't been able to develop real AI" she explains.

"Yes you have." you argue. "You make all sorts of things with AI chips"

"The chips do perfectly model the human brain." she say. "But we have never been able to create a mind to run it."

"What does this have to do with me?" you ask.

"We need your mind?" she says. "We are going transfer your mind to an AI chip to control one of our products."

"What product?" you ask.

"You'll be going into one of our toys." she says. "A baby girl doll."

"What?" you ask, "I can't be a baby girl."

"Don't worry." she says. "You'll be trained first. By the time you are transferred you'll be quite comfortable being someone's little girl." She reaches out to take your hand. "Now let's go find you a pretty dress."
1111.title: A man named Daniel

11111.content:

You will call me Mommy and totally obey me. Since you were such a good little girl, I let you choose with witch part of the training, we begin. You can choose between diaper training, and getting to know how wonderful being breast fed by Mommy is."

You quickly consider your options and decide to

11111211.title: Be a Good Boy

111112112.content: Do you need a nap?
111112112.title: Other

1111121121.content:
"Alright baby it's nap time," she announces.

She directs you over to a large pink crib and helps you in. You lay down on the soft mattress and let the woman tuck you in tight, restricting your movement. "Alright baby, have a good night sleep." she says.

She then bends over to give you a soft kiss on your forehead, turns the lights off and walks out the door, leaving you in the darkness with just your thoughts. Soon you find you eyes becoming heavier and you fall into a deep sleep. Outside of your nursery the woman is still standing outside and was watching you through a window the whole time. Just then a woman with long red hair walks up behind her and says, "Hello Amanda, I came by to see how your subjects training is going," she then peers into the nursery and sees you napping and replies, "and it seems it's going very well."

"It is Jessica," she says, "He's been one of the most cooperative subjects I've ever had to deal with. He might even be ready for transfer by tomorrow."

"Well," Jessica says skeptically, "we'll see how he is tomorrow and then we'll see if he's so cooperative."

The two woman then walk away from your room where you are fast asleep. You wake up after a long nights sleep and notice that your diaper is...
1111121121.title: Naptime

14.content: What sort of sex toy?
14.title: A sex toy

info.brief_description: You are kidnapped by a company which plans to transfer your mind into a toy or device
info.description:
If you like reading or writing interactive stories with AB/DL themes please join our Google Group:
https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/thicklypadded

Since announcing their development of real AI, Cognitech has become one of the biggest technology companies in the world. They use their unique processors in a wide range of products from business computing systems to expensive children's toys.

Their technology is a closely guarded secret and nobody else has been able to figure out how they do it. You find out the hard way when you are kidnapped and prepared to have your mind transferred into one of their products.
